page.title: 09VALE PARK - NEW BRIGHTON
page.content: We would like to tell you about New Brighton's Vale Park. Vale Park is quite a big public park with swings, slides, trees, rose gardens and a bandstand. There are four entrances to Vale Park and one leads you onto the promenade. The bandstand is very interesting because people perform shows there. One of these is called {JOYTIME},and is a competition for young children. The finals of this competition are held at the Floral Pavilion which is a big theatre on New Brighton front. Another event that takes place at the bandstand is {FOLK IN THE PARK}where folk groups come and sing on Sunday afternoons. People walking around the park can buy refreshments at a small shop and the can sit on the hills and watch the river.{ {N.Parry(9)&C.Thompson(10)}
